thread.title: Swansea compound Aston Villa's misery; Leicester edge Palace - Fox Sports
thread.title_full: Swansea compound Aston Villa's misery; Leicester edge Palace - Fox Sports - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Fox Sports
title: Swansea compound Aston Villa's misery; Leicester edge Palace - Fox Sports
text:
Tim Sherwood's reign at Aston Villa is in serious jeopardy after Swansea's Andrew Ayew struck a late winner at Villa Park on Saturday. Aston Villa lost 2-1 to Swansea at Villa Park in the Premier League on Saturday to increase the pressure on manager Tim Sherwood.
 Fox Sports.
